ovdesc.p: The application is used to record the NAV details for funds when known. Multiple trade references can be provided.
On committing the record, T24 will create two SECURITY.TRANSFER records in "INAU ".
Transfer in record is created to buy positions of the original security for the NAV recieved.
Transfer out record is created to reverse the Dummy security positions .

desc.p: Unique reference which identifies the transaction. Only the sequence number (nnnnn) is required to be input.
The Application will automatically generate the prefix (SCBUP) and the first 5 digits (yyddd) and attach the sequence number.
The sequence number may be either User defined or System generated.
This field will hold Original security for which the NAV is captured.
It should be valid security Master ID
This field holds the Price (Net Asset Value) for the Original security. The NAV is the execution price for the fund order placed.
This field will hold the sec trade IDs for which execution details need to be updated.
This is a multi-value field and it will accept valid SEC.TRADE credit transaction ids
This fields gets defaulted with the value in the field UPFRONT.SEC from security master application pertaining to the security defined in FUND.ID
